ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Date of Most Recent Provider Visit:
Who was in control of the visit?
Notes: 1= Neither/do not know; 2= The provider; 3= You; 4= Both you and the provider

ElementDescription: Was there equal exchange of information with the provider?
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: The provider let me know that what we talked about was confidential.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: The provider treated me with respect.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: The provider did not listen to me.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: The provider was sympathetic to me.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: The provider was nonjudgmental about me.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I felt comfortable enough with the provider to ask the questions I needed.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: The provider explained everything I needed to know.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly Agree
1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly Agree
